Translation:

「記憶に残らないものも、私は保持します; 私が忘れたいものは、忘れることができません。」

Note:

* "Auch" is translated as 「また」(mata) in Japanese, which is a particle that indicates addition or continuation.
* "was" is translated as 「もの」(mono), which means "thing" or "matter".
* "ich nicht in der Erinnerung behalten will" is translated as 「私が記憶に残らないもの」(Watashi ga kioku ni nokoranai mono), which means "things that I don't want to remember".
* "das behalte ich" is translated as 「私は保持します」(Watashi wa hozon shimasu), which means "I will keep it".
* "was ich jedoch vergessen will" is translated as 「私が忘れたいもの」(Watashi ga wasuretai mono), which means "things that I want to forget".
* "das kann ich nicht vergessen" is translated as 「忘れることができません」(Wasure koto ga dekiru koto ga aru), which means "I can't forget".
source: "Auch was ich nicht in der Erinnerung behalten will, das behalte ich; was ich jedoch vergessen will, das kann ich nicht vergessen."

system:
記憶に残らないものも、私は保持します; しかし、私が忘れたいものは、忘れることができません。

Translation:

「記憶に残らないものも、私は保持します; しかし、私が忘れたいものは、忘れることができません。」

Note:

* "Auch" is translated as 「また」(mata) in Japanese, which is a particle that indicates addition or continuation.
* "was" is translated as 「もの」(mono), which means "thing" or "matter."
* "ich nicht in der Erinnerung behalten will" is translated as 「私が記憶に残らないもの」(Watashi ga kioku ni nokoranai mono), which means "things that I don't want to remember."
* "das behalte ich" is translated as 「私は保持します」(Watashi wa hozon shimasu), which means "I will keep it."
* "was ich jedoch vergessen will" is translated as 「私が忘れたいもの」(Watashi ga wasuretai mono), which means "things that I want to forget."
* "das kann ich nicht vergessen" is translated as 「それは忘れることができません」(Sore wa wasureru koto ga deki masen), which means "I can't forget that."
source: "Auch was ich nicht in der Erinnerung behalten will, das behalte ich; was ich jedoch vergessen will, das kann ich nicht vergessen."
